name: Swades AI
headline: Applied AI Research Lab
description:
Swades AI is an AI research lab building commercial applications using breakthrough AI models. We leverage both open/closed source models to solve application level problems.

Our family of startups include:

OpenMic (https://www.openmic.ai/) : AI phone agents that can do both inbound/outbound calls across different use-cases such as healthcare, logistics & trucking, sales automation etc.

SNR Audio (https://www.snr.audio/) : TTS/STT API at 1/10 the cost of existing providers.

Poolcompute (https://www.poolcompute.com/): GPU marketplace for both centralized/decentralized GPUs at lowest costs

Optic Intellect (https://www.opticintellect.com/) : Large vision models for computer vision tasks

Joinarena.ai (https://www.joinarena.ai/) : AI interviewer for screening calls

Powerdialer.ai (https://www.powerdialer.ai/): Cold calling Sales automation tool

Codesama (https://www.codesama.com/): AI powered github code reviews

founders.name: Kaushik Tiwari, Founder
founders.description: Thiel Fellow & Columbia Grad. I have worked in digital health, insurtech, fintech and AI.

founders.name: Saumik Tiwari, Founder
founders.description: Faced medical debt as a student-athlete. Now, building new financial products for the 99%. Previously, @dormroomfund @trinitycollege

The Hindi word "Swades" or "Swadesh" (स्वदेश) translates to "one's own country" or "homeland" in English.
Research Verticals
## Explore Swades AI's cutting-edge AI research verticals.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/66b08e612acaa96efec28863_visionlogo.webp)
### OpticIntellect
Accelerate AI with Domain-Specific Vision Models
Domain-specific vision models which enhance computer vision applications by enabling rapid deployment without extensive data preparation
[Live Website](https://www.swades.ai/<https:/www.snr.audio/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/669bfcf763bfa4c0c519cde6_poolcompute-logo.webp)
### Poolcompute
World's Largest GPU Marketplace
Achieve 10X-100X more inferences per dollar by connecting to largest pool of secure & community GPUs available.
[Live Website](https://www.swades.ai/<https:/www.snr.audio/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/66b0b725393ab0f51b04712f_663098f3d94049efe2541b1a_openmic%20logo.webp)
### OpenMic
AI reps revolutionizing efficiency in inbound and outbound phone calls.
Deploy AI voice agents for calls. Pull custom data, link to 5000+ external apps & trigger actions with sub-second latency.
[Live Website](https://www.swades.ai/<https:/www.snr.audio/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/669bfb451f2c3433f3e69c3f_snr-logo.webp)
### Signal Noise Ratio
Foundational Voice Models for TTS & ASR
TTS & ASR Models 10x cheaper than ElevenLabs and ‍2x cheaper than Deepgram & Assembly.
[Live Website](https://www.swades.ai/<https:/www.snr.audio/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bde61628276b68dbd78ed_cross-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/66b08e612acaa96efec28863_visionlogo.webp)
### OpticIntellect
Domain-specific vision models which enhance computer vision applications by enabling rapid deployment without extensive data preparation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc846744069cb3f131312_link-icon.svg)[opticintellect.com](https://www.swades.ai/<https:/www.opticintellect.com/>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/66b0b42a7f7790115aa090d0_OpticIntellect.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc9f0d2c120848b60320e_Frame%202147223587.png)](https://www.swades.ai/<#>)
### What Are OpticIntellect's Vision Models?
OpticIntellect's vision models are domain-specific, pre-trained models designed for rapid deployment in various industries. These models eliminate the need for extensive data preparation and labeling, making it easier to implement advanced computer vision technologies.
### Why Choose OpticIntellect?
OpticIntellect's models offer immediate results, high accuracy, and flexible deployment options, including cloud and edge integration. With natural-language query capabilities, these models enhance efficiency and streamline processes in sectors like healthcare, manufacturing, and ecommerce.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bde61628276b68dbd78ed_cross-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/669bfcf763bfa4c0c519cde6_poolcompute-logo.webp)
### Poolcompute
Achieve 10X-100X more inferences per dollar by connecting to largest pool of secure & community GPUs available.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc846744069cb3f131312_link-icon.svg)[poolcompute.com](https://www.swades.ai/<https:/www.poolcompute.com/>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/669bfc94170541ececfe297f_Frame%202147223587.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc9f0d2c120848b60320e_Frame%202147223587.png)](https://www.swades.ai/<#>)
### What is Poolcompute?
Our GPU network ranges from lower-cost hobbyist providers to Tier-4 data centers with 99.99% guaranteed uptime, over 10PB of network storage, and millions of users with over 4 billion requests managed.
### Centralized GPU Systems
Secure Cloud operates in top-tier data centers (T3/T4) through our trusted partners. This ensures high reliability, strong security, and quick response times to prevent downtimes. For sensitive or enterprise workloads, we highly recommend using Secure Cloud.
### Decentralized GPU Systems
Our decentralized platform connects vetted, invite-only compute providers with consumers for peer-to-peer GPU computing. While they may not match the power and redundancy of large providers, they offer quality servers at an affordable price.for more information, visit [poolcompute.com.](https://www.swades.ai/<https:/www.poolcompute.com>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bde61628276b68dbd78ed_cross-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/66b0b725393ab0f51b04712f_663098f3d94049efe2541b1a_openmic%20logo.webp)
### OpenMic
Deploy AI voice agents for calls. Pull custom data, link to 5000+ external apps & trigger actions with sub-second latency.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc846744069cb3f131312_link-icon.svg)[openmic.ai](https://www.swades.ai/<http:/openmic.ai>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/66b0cc4cf789c94cd106f62f_Openmic%20AI.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc9f0d2c120848b60320e_Frame%202147223587.png)](https://www.swades.ai/<#>)
### What is OpenMic.ai?
OpenMic.ai is a platform offering AI-powered voice agents designed to manage inbound and outbound phone calls. These AI agents can handle a variety of tasks such as scheduling appointments, processing claims, managing customer loyalty programs, and more.
### Why Use OpenMic.ai?
OpenMic.ai simplifies and enhances business operations by providing immediate, scalable, and efficient AI solutions. By integrating with over 5000 apps, these agents can trigger actions with sub-second latency, ensuring seamless workflow automation and enhanced customer interactions.
### How Does OpenMic.ai Work?
The platform enables developers to quickly build and deploy AI agents using templates or custom scripts. These agents can handle natural-language queries and provide detailed conversation data, ensuring accurate and contextually relevant interactions. Additionally, OpenMic.ai supports flexible deployment options, including cloud and edge integrations.
For more information, visit [OpenMic.ai](https://www.swades.ai/<https:/www.openmic.ai/>).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bde61628276b68dbd78ed_cross-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/669bfb451f2c3433f3e69c3f_snr-logo.webp)
### Signal Noise Ratio
TTS & ASR Models 10x cheaper than ElevenLabs and ‍2x cheaper than Deepgram & Assembly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc846744069cb3f131312_link-icon.svg)[snr.audio](https://www.swades.ai/<http:/www.snr.audio>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/66b086b58265c32fcb097653_snrthumbnail.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc9f0d2c120848b60320e_Frame%202147223587.png)](https://www.swades.ai/<#>)
### Why SNR Audio?
Our models are used by enterprise customers who have huge datasets and require enterprise-scale TTS & ASR solutions. Leveraging our cutting-edge technology, these clients have seamlessly integrated superior text-to-speech and automatic speech recognition capabilities into their products, achieving significant cost savings and enhanced performance in their voice applications
> ** _TTS & ASR Models 10x cheaper than ElevenLabs and 2x cheaper than Deepgram & Assembly._**
### Introducing EchoTTS
Our next-gen TTS model surpasses competitors on performance at one-tenth the cost. Enjoy low latency websocket support and mult-speaker voice generation at pricing that helps you scale.
### Introducing ScribeASR
Our next-gen TTS model surpasses competitors on performance at one-tenth the cost. Enjoy low latency websocket support and mult-speaker voice generation at pricing that helps you scale.
‍
Explore now at [snr.audio.](https://www.swades.ai/<https:/www.snr.audio>)

## Partner with Swades.ai
Custom-tuned LLMs, trained on your specific data, consistently deliver superior results. Swades AI offers sovereign LLMs through a flexible SaaS subscription model. This cost-effective solution provides you with control, security, and adaptability, eliminating maintenance burdens and vendor lock-in. Experience the power of personalized AI without compromise.
[Get Started with Expert AI Solutions](https://www.swades.ai/<#>)

### Poolcompute
Achieve 10X-100X more inferences per dollar by connecting to largest pool of secure & community GPUs available.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc846744069cb3f131312_link-icon.svg)poolcompute.com⟨10⟩
![⟨11⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc9f0d2c120848b60320e_Frame%202147223587.png)](https://www.swades.ai/<#>)
### What is Poolcompute?
Our GPU network ranges from lower-cost hobbyist providers to Tier-4 data centers with 99.99% guaranteed uptime, over 10PB of network storage, and millions of users with over 4 billion requests managed.
### Centralized GPU Systems
Secure Cloud operates in top-tier data centers (T3/T4) through our trusted partners. This ensures high reliability, strong security, and quick response times to prevent downtimes. For sensitive or enterprise workloads, we highly recommend using Secure Cloud.
### Decentralized GPU Systems
Our decentralized platform connects vetted, invite-only compute providers with consumers for peer-to-peer GPU computing. While they may not match the power and redundancy of large providers, they offer quality servers at an affordable price.for more information, visit poolcompute.com.⟨12⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bde61628276b68dbd78ed_cross-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/66b0b725393ab0f51b04712f_663098f3d94049efe2541b1a_openmic%20logo.webp)
### OpenMic
Deploy AI voice agents for calls. Pull custom data, link to 5000+ external apps & trigger actions with sub-second latency.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc846744069cb3f131312_link-icon.svg)openmic.ai⟨13⟩
![⟨14⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc9f0d2c120848b60320e_Frame%202147223587.png)](https://www.swades.ai/<#>)
### What is OpenMic.ai?
OpenMic.ai is a platform offering AI-powered voice agents designed to manage inbound and outbound phone calls. These AI agents can handle a variety of tasks such as scheduling appointments, processing claims, managing customer loyalty programs, and more.
### Why Use OpenMic.ai?
OpenMic.ai simplifies and enhances business operations by providing immediate, scalable, and efficient AI solutions. By integrating with over 5000 apps, these agents can trigger actions with sub-second latency, ensuring seamless workflow automation and enhanced customer interactions.
### How Does OpenMic.ai Work?
The platform enables developers to quickly build and deploy AI agents using templates or custom scripts. These agents can handle natural-language queries and provide detailed conversation data, ensuring accurate and contextually relevant interactions. Additionally, OpenMic.ai supports flexible deployment options, including cloud and edge integrations.
For more information, visit OpenMic.ai⟨15⟩.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bde61628276b68dbd78ed_cross-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/669a6bb71b4e9d3fdc24583f/669bfb451f2c3433f3e69c3f_snr-logo.webp)
### Signal Noise Ratio
TTS & ASR Models 10x cheaper than ElevenLabs and ‍2x cheaper than Deepgram & Assembly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc846744069cb3f131312_link-icon.svg)snr.audio⟨16⟩
![⟨17⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66884f513018d5921c6613aa/669bc9f0d2c120848b60320e_Frame%202147223587.png)](https://www.swades.ai/<#>)
### Why SNR Audio?
Our models are used by enterprise customers who have huge datasets and require enterprise-scale TTS & ASR solutions. Leveraging our cutting-edge technology, these clients have seamlessly integrated superior text-to-speech and automatic speech recognition capabilities into their products, achieving significant cost savings and enhanced performance in their voice applications
> ** _TTS & ASR Models 10x cheaper than ElevenLabs and 2x cheaper than Deepgram & Assembly._**
### Introducing EchoTTS
Our next-gen TTS model surpasses competitors on performance at one-tenth the cost. Enjoy low latency websocket support and mult-speaker voice generation at pricing that helps you scale.
### Introducing ScribeASR
Our next-gen TTS model surpasses competitors on performance at one-tenth the cost. Enjoy low latency websocket support and mult-speaker voice generation at pricing that helps you scale.
‍

generated_description:
Swades AI is an ambitious startup founded in 2023, operating out of New York, and is part of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch. The name "Swades," which means "homeland" in Hindi, aptly reflects its mission: to harness cutting-edge artificial intelligence for practical, real-world applications.

At its core, Swades AI functions as an Applied AI Research Lab. The team of five is focused on building commercial applications using breakthrough AI models, drawing from both open and closed-source technologies to tackle application-level challenges.

Swades AI has an ecosystem of startups, each targeting various facets of AI and business efficiency:

1. **[OpenMic](https://www.openmic.ai/)**: AI-powered phone agents designed for both inbound and outbound calls across industries like healthcare and logistics.
   
2. **[SNR Audio](https://www.snr.audio/)**: Offers Text-to-Speech (TTS) and Speech-to-Text (STT) services at a fraction of the cost of existing providers, making these technologies more accessible.

3. **[Poolcompute](https://www.poolcompute.com/)**: A marketplace for GPU resources, connecting users with centralized and decentralized GPU options for maximum cost-efficiency.

4. **[Optic Intellect](https://www.opticintellect.com/)**: Develops large vision models aimed at enhancing computer vision tasks, enabling rapid deployment with minimal data preparation.

5. **[Joinarena.ai](https://www.joinarena.ai/)**: Functions as an AI interviewer, streamlining screening processes.

6. **[Powerdialer.ai](https://www.powerdialer.ai/)**: Specializes in automating cold calling sales processes.

7. **[Codesama](https://www.codesama.com/)**: Provides AI-powered code review solutions for developers leveraging GitHub.

Swades AI is co-founded by Kaushik and Saumik Tiwari, both of whom have a background in investing and entrepreneurship. Under their leadership, the company is carving a niche in applied AI, with several products aiming to make advanced technologies accessible to traditional businesses.

The company’s strategic focus lies in delivering solutions that can genuinely enhance operational efficiency and are designed to be impactful across multiple industries. Swades AI is a firm believer in harnessing AI breakthroughs into tools that people can actually use.

For more insights into their projects and initiatives, visit their website: [Swades AI](https://www.swades.ai/).
